detectors.description:
Bor._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint96,uint96) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bor.sol#304-315) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bor.sol#307)
detectors.markdown:
[Bor._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint96,uint96)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bor.sol#L304-L315) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bor.sol#L307)

detectors.description:
Bor.permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bor.sol#105-124) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(now <= deadline,BOR::permit: signature expired) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bor.sol#119)

detectors.description: Pragma version^0.6.12 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bor.sol#3) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.6.11
